title: Abba's Child: The Cry of the Heart for Intimate Belonging
description: Many Christians feel broken and angry but don’t think they can express these real feelings around others―or to God. So we put on a mask to hide our identity. Feelings of embarrassment and shame make us hide from the One who truly loves us. Author Brennan Manning encourages you to let go of this stressful, unreal impostor lifestyle and freely accept your identity as a child of God. Find the rest that you long for as you grow in character and accept His lordship. Includes discussion questions.
author: Brennan Manning
